===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{n-g|Indicates that the previous word has [[possessive|possession]] of the next one.}}
#: {{zh-x|生命 之 道|the way '''of''' life}}
#: {{zh-x|^美國 之 聲|Voice '''of''' America}}
# {{n-g|Indicates that the previous word [[modify|modifies]] the next one.}}
#* {{zh-x|尺寸之功|a minor contribution}}
# {{†}} [[this|This]].
#* {{zh-x|之 子 于 歸。|'''This''' girl is to get married.|ref=Shijing}}
# {{†}} To [[sprout]], to [[come about]].
#* {{zh-x|如 語{yù} 焉 而未 之然。|As though you have said something to your parents but their reply has not yet '''come'''.|ref=Liji}}
# {{†}} To [[go]].
#* {{zh-x|吾 欲 之 楚。|I want to '''go to''' Chu.|ref=Zhanguoce}}
# {{n-g|The third-person pronoun: [[him]], [[her]], [[it]], [[them]], when it appears in a non-subject position in the sentence.}}
#* {{zh-x|好{hào} 一一 聽 之。|He preferred to listen to '''them''' one-by-one.|ref=Hanfeizi}}
#* {{zh-x|我們 不能 對 此 事 聽之任之。|We cannot pass '''this matter''' by without protest.}}
#* {{zh-x|甘 橘，大厘 城 有 之，其 味 酸。|Dali City has sweet tangerines, but their flavour is sour.|CL|ref={{RQ:Manshu|7|Tea, Trees, Herbs and Fruits|7}}}}

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[し]] (shi)|kanon=[[し]] (shi)
|kun=[[ゆく]] (yuku), [[これ]] (kore), [[の]] (no)
|nanori=[[ゆき]] (yuki)
}}

====Usage notes====
Formerly used to represent the possessive particle {{ja-r|の}}. In modern Japanese, this character is seldom used, and most commonly found in names, such as {{m|ja|龍之介|tr=Ryūnosuke}}.
